= Introduction =

To build libperl.so is the first step before anything about using Perl on android.


= Details =

We use the android prebuilt toolchain and the agcc gcc wrapper to build libperl upon the [OnBionic bionic] libc. once libperl is built, it cannot be used as is on the HTC G1 phone because of missing symbols in that older version. So, to build a binary that uses libperl on android, we must add some object files from the latest bionic source to link with:
  * div.c
